title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Rob Parker are in for Dan Patrick, and the guys debate whether or not Steph Curry and the Golden State Warriors should be viewed as the favorites to win the NBA championship this season, and debate whether or not the last few years of disappointment in Brooklyn have proven that Kevin Durant isn’t a great leader. Plus, former NFL general manager Rick Spielman swings by to preview the upcoming NFL Draft.

#JSS

#OddCouple

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
